DOC.brief_summary: To determine the effectiveness of CP-868,596 + docetaxel, AG-013736 + docetaxel and CP-868,596 + AG-013736 + docetaxel in patients previously treated for non-small cell lung cancer.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2 Study in Patients With Advanced Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer Using New Agents With and Without Docetaxel.
DOC.criteria: Platinumpretreated patients with advanced stage IIIb or IV NSCLC Centrallylocated tumors
